flawed_nl_solution:
He dropped 2 cantaloupes and had 8 left over at the end of the day, so he sold 30 - 2 - 8 = <<30-2-8=20>>20 cantaloupes.
Three honeydews were rotten, and he had 9 left at the end of the day, so he sold 27 - 3 - 9 = <<27-3-9=51>>51 honeydews.
He sold 20 cantaloupes * $2/cantaloupe = $<<20*2=40>>40 in cantaloupes
He also sold 51 honeydews * $3/honeydew = $<<51*3=153>>153 in honeydews.
Altogether he made $40 + $153 = $<<40+153=193>>193
#### 193

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
